TopicTitle: How do I install Planet Packs in 1.9.1?

Articles.Content:
Hello there!

In the last Months I've been trying to install Planet Packs, for example Kerbal Galaxy. I put the KG Folder into GameData where I already had the Kopernicus Folder. But when I booted up KSP, the new Planets didn't appear. Does somebody know how to install Planet Packs so that the Planets appear in the Game? I'm looking forward to receive Answers on that Question!

Sincerely,

Nathan's Space Center

19 minutes ago, Nathan's Space Center said:

Hello there!

In the last Months I've been trying to install Planet Packs, for example Kerbal Galaxy. I put the KG Folder into GameData where I already had the Kopernicus Folder. But when I booted up KSP, the new Planets didn't appear. Does somebody know how to install Planet Packs so that the Planets appear in the Game? Nathan's Space Center

Welcome to the forum! 

If you're playing on 1.9.1, you can't use Kopernicus, as it is version locked. If you want to play with planet packs, I suggest you downgrade to 1.8.1. Once Kopernicus is updated for 1.9.1, then try it with this version.

1 hour ago, alberro+ said:

I could try that out. Thanks!
